X-Forge Core File List

Here is a list of all files with brief descriptions:
XFcAddress.h
XFcAdvertiser.h
XFcApp.hApplication class
XFcAppPrefs.hUsed to pass application preferences to the core in xfcAppPrefs() call
XFcAsmFixedDiv.hARM assembler fixed division functions
XFcAsmFixedMul.hARM assembler fixed point multiplication functions
XFcAsyncCallBack.h
XFcAudio.hAudio library
XFcAudioBuffer.hAudio buffer base class
XFcAudioFlags.hAudio flags
XFcAudioFormat.hAudio library sound format class
XFcAudioProducer.hAudio producer base class
XFcAudioStream.hAudio stream base class
XFcAutoDataPacket.hAutomatic packet frame attach to packet MTU
XFcBtAddress.h
XFcBtAdvertiser.h
XFcBtClientWin.h
XFcBtCommService.h
XFcBtHandler.hBluetooth data handler
XFcBtHostEntry.h

XFcBtSecurity.h
XFcBtServerSearch.hBluetooth XForge server search
XFcBtUUID.h
XFcCFL.hCompressed File Library routines
XFcClientCommWin.hBase for clients
XFcClientInetCommWinPriHelp.h
XFcClientLost.hClient lost interface
XFcClientStreamSocket.hNetwork socket stream communication, "client" side connection
XFcCommHeaderPacket.hCommunication header serialization
XFcCommPacketBase.hBase for communication packet
XFcCommService.h
XFcCommunication.h
XFcCommunicationConstants.h
XFcCommunicationHandler.hCommunication handler base
XFcCommunicationScheduler.hXForge communication
XFcConfig.hThis file takes care of most of platform-dependent (type) definitions
XFcCore.hMain header file for X-Forge Core
XFcCoreEnums.hCore enumerations
XFcCPUInfo.hCPU info
XFcCPUInfoARM.hCPU info for ARM processors
XFcDataReceiver.hData receiver interface
XFcDataReceiverHashTable.hData receiver hash table

XFcDgramSocket.h
XFcEmbed.hUsed to access the desktop windows embedding interface
XFcFastAllocator.hFast memory allocator template
XFcFile.hFile handling interface
XFcFileFind.hFile-finding routines
XFcFixed.hFixed point class
XFcGL.hX-Forge Graphics Library
XFcGLComplexSurfaceResource.hTexture resource
XFcGLDeviceInfo.hX-Forge Graphics Library device info
XFcGLEnums.hXFcGL enumerations
XFcGLProfiler.hGL Profiler interface
XFcGLResourceSurface.hXFcGL resource surface class
XFcGLSingleSurfaceResource.hTexture resource
XFcGLSurface.hXFcGL surface class
XFcGLSurfaceToolkit.hXFcGLSurfaceToolkit class implements various methods for modifying and processing surfaces
XFcGLTexture.hTexture resource
XFcGLTextureBuilder.hTexture builder class
XFcGLTextureFromFile.hTexture builder from image files
XFcGLTriangleInfoBuffer.hXFcGL triangle info buffer class
XFcGLVertexBuffer.hXFcGL vertex buffer class

XFcObjectPacketBase.hSendable packet buffer
XFcPacketCreator.hPacket creation interface
XFcPixelBlender.hPixel blending functions/macros
XFcPixelConverter.hPixel format conversion functions/macros
XFcPrimitiveDraw.hXFcPrimitiveDraw class implements drawing of various high-level 2D primitives
XFcPrimitiveDrawFiller.hXFcPrimitiveDrawFiller defines a base class for fillers used by XFcPrimitiveDraw
XFcPrimitiveDrawGradientFiller.hXFcPrimitiveDrawGradientFiller defines a base class for gradient fillers
XFcPrimitiveDrawImageFiller.hXFcPrimitiveDrawImageFiller is a basic image filler that doesn't support tiling or transformations of the source image
XFcPrimitiveDrawPatternFiller.hXFcPrimitiveDrawPatternFiller is a filler that loops a bitmap pattern with a transformation
XFcPrimitiveShapes.hXFcPrimitiveShapes class contains static function for defining simple graphic shapes
XFcPrimitiveTranslator.hXFcPrimitiveTranslator class translates drawing commands for XFcPrimitiveDraw
XFcPriorityHelp.hPriority linked list help
XFcPriorityList.hPriority Linked list template
XFcProfiler.hBuilt-in profiler helper functionality
XFcQuaternion.hXFcQuaternion math
XFcRectangle.hXFcRectangle
XFcRemoteCommunication.h
XFcRemoteCommunicationRecv.h
XFcRenderer.hRenderer interface class
XFcResource.hResource base class
XFcResourceManager.hResource manager
XFcRFCOMMSocket.h
XFcRLESprite.hXFcRLESprite.h is the header file for the XFcRLESprite class, which implements drawing and construction of RLE sprites
XFcSingleDataPacket.hSingle packet frame attach to packet MTU
XFcSocket.h
XFcSocketConstants.hRedefines supported socket flags for every supported platforms
XFcStreamSocket.hStreaming socket (tcp/ip)
XFcStringToolkit.hStatic string functions (this is not a string class)
XFcThread.hCommon thread handling
XFcThreadObject.hXFcThreadObject class for multitasking
XFcUdpEngine.hUDP opening and closing service
XFcUdpRecv.hUDP data receiver
XFcUnknownSender.hInterface for unidentified data sender
XFcUse.hStatic link 'use' interface for code parts to discard unused parts at link time
XFcUUID.h
XFcVector.hVector math header file
XFcVibrate.hVibrator interface
